ygData.subject: RE: Newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I wouldn t say no one as druids (harmony, outdoors only but AoE), clerics and enchanters (lull line) also get calm spells that allow them to do so. Thormael
ygData.messageBody:
I wouldn't say no one as druids (harmony, outdoors only but AoE), clerics
and enchanters (lull line) also get calm spells that allow them to do so.

Thormael


>Lament is the best song you get other than Selo's until you are 11th level.
>It will allow you to easily solo critters characters 5 levels higher than
>you just look at because they can't take 3 at once. It allowed me to sol
>at
>the bandit camp in Lesser Faydark 4 levels before anyone else I ever saw
>there. No one else could handle the multiple spawns they would have to
>face, but I could easily pull one out at a time and make boocou plat off
>the
>bronze spears they carried. same deal in w karana with bandits if you are
>careful. If Lament is resisted you just flee immediately via Selo's and
>there's no problem.
>
> Kitasi
